metadata.title: USN-6984-1 -- WebOb vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that WebOb incorrectly handled certain URLs. An attacker could possibly use this issue to control a redirect or forward to another URL.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6984-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  python-webob-doc - 1:1.8.5-2ubuntu0.1 python3-webob - 1:1.8.5-2ubuntu0.1 No subscription required
